commands.name: recently-changed-documents
commands.title: View Recently Changed Documents
commands.subtitle: Namuwiki
commands.description: View documents that have recently changed in namu.wiki

commands.name: trending-searches
commands.title: View Trending Searches
commands.subtitle: Namuwiki
commands.description: View current real-time trending searches in namu.wiki

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
